# function: region_full_name

Gets the Azure full name for a region.
This function takes a region name in any format (full name, short name, or CLI name) and returns the full display name.

## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    azname = {
      source = "BHoggs/azname"
    }
  }
}

provider "azname" {
  environment = "prod"
}

# Convert Azure region CLI name to full display name
# Useful for displaying user-friendly region names
output "full_name_from_cli" {
  value = provider::azname::region_full_name("westus2")
  # Returns: "West US 2"
}

output "full_name_from_short" {
  value = provider::azname::region_full_name("wus2")
  # Returns: "West US 2"
}

# Common use case: displaying region names in outputs or UI
resource "azname_name" "example" {
  name          = "myapp"
  resource_type = "azurerm_resource_group"
  location      = "westus2"
}

output "friendly_location" {
  description = "User-friendly region name for documentation"
  value       = provider::azname::region_full_name("westus2")
}
```

## Signature

<!-- signature generated by tfplugindocs -->
```text
region_full_name(region string) string
```

## Arguments

<!-- arguments generated by tfplugindocs -->
1. `region` (String) Region full name (e.g. 'West US 2'), short name (e.g. 'wus2'), or CLI name (e.g. 'westus2')
